originalText.text:
I visited their office at Elizabeth St. The reception staff is very helpful.

Dr. Mark Chu is great. As a new patient I felt he was a very good listener & very knowledgeable. We were able to schedule my procedure quickly & I was provided with clear instructions.

Procedure was over before I knew it & I was well taken care of afterward.

originalText.text: Completed upper and lower endoscopy at Downtown Gastroenterology today!  What a great experience. Staff is so accommodating, took me right in and had me set up. Anesthesiologist was calm, good natured and very detail oriented. Dr. Mark Chu whom completed my procedure was also very patient, and went over the details of my exam in a way one could really understand. Highly recommended - get your colonoscopy screening!

originalText.text:
The most unprofetionnal doctor ever.
Scheduled an appointment via ZocDoc, for 4pm because I was sever stomach pain.
Left work early to go to his office, when I got there, they couldn‚Äôt find my name. So the lady  added me and processed the paper work. Waited an hour for them to tell me the doctor left and they were so sorry. And they had the audacity to ask me if I want to reschedule. Really? I left work early ( even though I was very very very busy at work ) to come see  a doctor who doesn‚Äôt care about his patient?
No thank you.  First and last time Dr Mark Chu.
